items.title: Gran Espresso
items.description: Light and flavorful blend with cocoa and black pepper for an intense experience

items.title: Planalto
items.description: Brazilian dark roast with rich and velvety body, and hints of fruits and nuts

items.title: Piccollo
items.description: Mild and smooth blend featuring notes of toasted almond and dried cherry

items.title: Danche
items.description: Ethiopian hand-harvested blend densely packed with vibrant fruit notes

section.name: Why choose us?
section.description: A large part of our role is choosing which particular coffees will be featured  in our range. This means working closely with the best coffee growers to give you a more impactful experience on every level.

items.title: Best quality
items.description: Discover an endless variety of the worldâ€™s best artisan coffee from each of our roasters.

items.title: Exclusive benefits
items.description: Special offers and swag when you subscribe, including 30% off your first shipment.

items.title: Free shipping
items.description: We cover the cost and coffee is delivered fast. Peak freshness: guaranteed.

items.title: Pick your coffee
items.description: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

items.title: Choose the frequency
items.description: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

items.title: Receive and enjoy!
items.description: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.
